caption:
Meet the NEW Clifton 10 🎉 

A trusted trainer for daily miles, the Clifton has been the keystone of our cushioned styles for 10 years and counting. This next-generation update delivers a revitalized underfoot experience with an additional 3mm in heel-to-toe drop. Delivering the same ultralight cushioning that made the Clifton a fan favorite, we’ve fine-tuned the fit and added a breathable jacquard upper with double-lace lock to mitigate tongue migration. 

#FlyHumanFly #HOKA #Clifton10
